<h3 id="X31815">X(31815) = CENTER OF THE ORTHOPOLAR CIRCLE OF THESE TRIANGLES: ANTI-ASCELLA AND X3-ABC REFLECTIONS</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; a^10+(b^2+c^2)*a^8-4*(2*b^4+b^2*c^2+2*c^4)*a^6+2*(b^2+c^2)*(4*b^4-5*b^2*c^2+4*c^4)*a^4-(b^4+c^4)*(b^2-c^2)^2*a^2-(b^4-c^4)*(b^2-c^2)^3  :  :

<br>
<b>X(31815) = X(1657)-3*X(11402) = 3*X(12161)-2*X(31804) = 3*X(31802)-X(31804)</b>
<p>X(31815) lies on these lines:
{3,14389}, {4,93}, {5,17810}, {30,1181}, {49,31304}, {52,18569}, {143,18531}, {155,11819}, {343,7564}, {382,12160}, {389,14791}, {394,31830}, {517,31814}, {550,11425}, {568,18952}, {632,9815}, {1192,15122}, {1351,12370}, {1370,13630}, {1493,18925}, {1657,11402}, {2393,22802}, {3060,18404}, {3546,15741}, {3564,3627}, {3575,16266}, {4846,15704}, {5562,11818}, {5663,31810}, {5925,18431}, {5946,6643}, {6101,18420}, {6102,14790}, {6756,15068}, {6815,10627}, {6816,10095}, {6997,14128}, {7401,15067}, {7502,20424}, {7528,11591}, {7530,22660}, {7540,11441}, {7544,23039}, {7574,18912}, {7706,15644}, {9833,17824}, {10610,11427}, {11004,12254}, {13391,31807}, {13419,15083}, {13490,17814}, {14449,18377}, {14531,18474}, {18568,21969}, {28146,31811}, {28160,31812}</p>
<p>
X(31815) = midpoint of X(382) and X(12160)<br>
X(31815) = reflection of X(12161) in X(31802)<br>
</p>
